prodNameC: 亞培設計師尿液嗜中性白血球明膠酶相關脂質運載蛋白檢驗試劑組
ingredientsDesc:
ARCHITECT Urine NGAL Reagent Kit, 100 Tests/500 Tests
MICROPARTICLES 1 Bottle (6.6mL/27.0mL each) Anti-NGAL (mouse, monoclonal) coated microparticles in BIS-TRIS buffer with protein (bovine) stabilizer and detergent. 

CONJUGATE 1 Bottle (5.9mL/26.3mL each) Anti-NGAL (mouse, monoclonal) acridinium-labeled conjugate in MES buffer with protein (bovine) stabilizer and detergent. 

ARCHITECT Urine NGAL Calibrators 
6 Bottles (4.0 mL each) of ARCHITECT Urine NGAL Calibrators. The calibrators are at the following concentrations: 
Calibrator	Concentration (ng/mL)
Cal A	0.0
Cal B	10.0
Cal C	100.0
Cal D	500.0
Cal E	1000.0
Cal F	1500.0


ARCHITECT Urine NGAL Controls
3 Bottles (8.0 mL each) of ARCHITECT Urine NGAL Controls.  The controls are at the following concentrations: 
Control	Concentration (ug/L)	Range (ug/L)
CONTROL L	20.0	11.0 – 29.0
CONTROL M	200.0	110.0 – 290.0 
CONTROL H	1200.0	660.0 – 1740.0
applicantName: 美商亞培股份有限公司台灣分公司
applicantAddr: 台北市中山區民生東路三段49號5樓、6樓及51號6樓
efficacy: 本產品以化學冷光微粒免疫分析法(CMIA)定量檢測人類尿液中的嗜中性白血球明膠酶相關脂質運載蛋白 (neutrophil gelatinase-associated lipocalin，NGAL)。
mdFormat:
詳如中文標籤、說明書或包裝核定本(原94年11月22日標籤仿單核定本正本收回作廢)。

規格及標籤、說明書或包裝：詳如核定之中文說明書(原110年8月30日核定之標籤、說明書或包裝正本收回作廢)。
